00029 void CrashTest::parse_option(String option) {
00030   char *istr = strchr(option.c_str(), ':');
00031   HT_EXPECT(istr != 0, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00032   *istr++ = 0;
00033   m_countdown_map[option.c_str()] = atoi(istr);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void CrashTest::maybe_crash(const String &label) {
00037   CountDownMap::iterator iter = m_countdown_map.find(label);
00038   if (iter != m_countdown_map.end()) {
00039     if ((*iter).second == 0)
00040       _exit(1);
00041     m_countdown_map[label] = (*iter).second - 1;
00042   }
00043 }
